creator: pmenzel+bz.apache.org@molgen.mpg.de
text:
Created attachment 35157
Screenshot of the warning

When visiting the Apache HTTPD, the browser shows a warning.

> Loading mixed (insecure) display content “http://www.apache.org/events/current-event-125x125.png” on a secure page[Learn More] httpd.apache.org
> GET http://www.apache.org/events/current-event-125x125.png

Just fixed the whole navigation bar, thanks a lot for the report! Please re-open if anything is missing :)

Luca
creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
